message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 80% and you get 20%
You're being greedy, Alice. I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small consolation prize.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's meet in the middle and split it 60-40
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a little more, but don't expect any sympathy.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a better deal. 70-30 or I walk
You're getting close to desperation, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting the better end of this.
I'm running out of patience, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it
